name: ClickWatch
0:
”Alexa, open Click Watch”
”start the clock”
”stop the clock”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: click watch
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Click Watch offers a versatile stopwatch experience on Alexa, designed for your timekeeping needs. It combines voice and touch controls for seamless use.

Key features include essential stopwatch functions: start, stop, pause, and resume, as well as advanced split time logging for detailed tracking.

It provides customizable display options, including analog and digital formats. The analog display features a unique bezel design for laps and days indicators, along with precision inset dials.

The countdown timer lets you control the screen's duration, optimizing energy efficiency. Set it for seconds, hours, or more.

You can toggle screen buttons for tactile use or remove them for better visibility from a distance.

Voice-activated reminders help with time management, allowing you to set alerts linked to your stopwatch timings. (Note: Permission is required for this feature.)

Plus, you can customize audio feedback for a personalized experience, with auditory cues for start, stop, and lap times. The skill is designed for ease of use with touch or voice commands, catering to both casual and professional timekeeping needs.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
